appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: This plugin automatically solves CAPTCHAs on any website.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

whatSolveTabButtonTitle.message: Switch to What to solve tab

recaptchaTabButtonTitle.message: Switch to a Recaptcha advanced tab

accountKeyTitle.message: Enter your Anti-Captcha.com account key.

accountKeyTitleTitle.message: Enter your Anti-Captcha.com account key here

noAccountKey.message: Why do I need the key?

noAccountKeyInfo.message:
This plugin requires a special key to work.
You need to:
1. Register on Anti-Captcha.com.
2. Add funds to your account.
3. Find your key in the "API setup" page of the customer area.

noAccountKeyCloseTitle.message: Close the "Why do I need the key" window

autoSubmitFormInfo.message:
Sends the captcha solution to the target website for verification immediately after it's solved.
This feature might not work correctly on certain websites – uncheck it if a webpage reloads after solving.

useRecaptchaAcceleratorInfo.message:
This feature lets us solve reCAPTCHA 2 faster by sending minor HTML data around the reCAPTCHA block.
By providing this data, we can make reCAPTCHA 2 think it's being solved on an actual website.
No sensitive data is sent – only the cropped HTML code including the .g-recaptcha element subtree.
Example: <body><main class='main'><form action='/sendForm'><input type='text' name='somename'><div class='g-recaptcha'></div></form></main></body>
Unused attributes (except id, class, role, type, name, method, action) are removed.
Please be patient – this is a work in progress, but we believe it will save you time and money!

useRecaptchaPrecachingInfo.message: This feature can reduce Recaptcha solving time by half or even more, depending on how you solve CAPTCHAs. Recaptcha precache debug page

precachingKNumberInfo.message: The number of extra unoccupied precached tasks. The algorithm automatically adjusts this number between the min and max values for better performance and less spending. Recommended values: Min=2, Max=4.

precachingKNumberMinTitle.message: Please specify the minimum value of K-number range

precachingKNumberMaxTitle.message: Please specify the maximum value of K-number range

solveRecaptcha2.message: Solve reCAPTCHA 2 (I'm not a robot) automatically

solveRecaptcha2Info.message: Disable this option if you don't want to solve reCAPTCHA 2 automatically when found on a webpage. Regular image CAPTCHAs will work as usual.

solveRecaptcha3Info.message: Turn this option off if you don't want to solve new reCAPTCHA 3.

recaptcha3DesiredScoreTitle.message: Enter the desired Recaptcha 3 score you'd like to achieve.

solveInvisibleRecaptcha2Title.message: Enable/disable automatic solving of invisible reCAPTCHA 2

solveInvisibleRecaptcha2Info.message: Solves reCAPTCHA that appear as a small badge, usually in the bottom right corner of a webpage.

dontReuseRecaptchaSolution.message: Don't reuse previous reCAPTCHA 2 solution on the same page

dontReuseRecaptchaSolutionInfo.message: A new solving process will start for each reCAPTCHA box, even if a previous solution exists on the page (and hasn't expired yet). If this option is off, a new solving process will only begin after the previous solution on the page has expired.

whereSolveWhiteList.message: List of domains where CAPTCHAs should be solved

whereSolveBlackList.message: List of domains where CAPTCHAs should NOT be solved

whereSolveList.message: Domains where CAPTCHAs should/shouldn't be solved

whereSolveHostnameTitle.message: Enter the domain you want to add to the list

whereSolveActLikeWhiteListTitle.message: Only solve CAPTCHAs on listed domains

whereSolveActLikeBlackListTitle.message: Do not solve CAPTCHAs on these domains

whereSolveAttention.message: Attention: The whitelist is empty, so no CAPTCHAs will be solved.

solveFuncaptchaInfo.message: Enable this to automatically solve Funcaptcha.

solveGeetestInfo.message: Enable this to automatically solve Geetest.

solveHcaptchaInfo.message: Deprecated and will not be solved by our service

setIncomingWorkersUserAgentTitle.message: Enable/disable setting the incoming worker's User-Agent

setIncomingWorkersUserAgentInfo.message: For certain captchas (like hCaptcha), we receive the User-Agent of the worker who solved it. Enabling this option temporarily replaces your browser's User-Agent with the worker's for better compatibility (only on the current tab, for 110 seconds). This improves successful captcha solving ratio.

runExplicitInvisibleHcaptchaCallbackWhen.message: Enable/disable running the callback only when the challenge is shown (for explicit invisible hCaptcha)
Run the explicit invisible hCaptcha callback only when the challenge box is shown

An invisible hCaptcha will only be considered solved when the corresponding button is pressed or the Hcaptcha execute method is called. With this setting, the website's callback is only executed when the challenge box is visible.
This is a new behavior. Disable this checkbox if you encounter issues with invisible hCaptchas.

startRecaptcha2SolvingWhenChallengeShown.message: Enable/disable solving reCAPTCHA 2 only when the challenge box is shown
Start solving reCAPTCHA 2 only when the challenge box is shown
The solving process will only begin when the reCAPTCHA challenge box (with images) is visible. This is useful for invisible reCAPTCHA 2 and can save you money and prevent unnecessary callbacks.

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2Title.message: Don't solve reCAPTCHA 2 if hidden on the page

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2.message: Solve only presented (not hidden) on a web-page reCAPTCHA 2

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2Info.message: Enables solving only reCAPTCHA 2 that are visible on the page. ReCAPTCHA 2 located in an invisible or hidden container won't be solved.

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarksTitle.message: Enable/disable automatic image CAPTCHA selection and solving

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarks.message: Use predefined regular image CAPTCHA marks

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarksInfo.message: Regular image CAPTCHAs will be automatically located, marked, and solved on every webpage. This is based on the selections of other users, but your local marks will always take priority.

reenableContextmenuTitle.message: Force browser to show the context menu

reenableContextmenuInfo.message: Enable this if the target website disables the context menu, preventing you from marking images and inputs as CAPTCHAs. This feature may affect websites using custom context menus.

proxyOnTasksInfo.message: All captcha tasks (except regular image captchas) will be solved using the proxy you configure below. This may be necessary if the target website checks the solver's IP address. Your configured proxy will be sent to anti-captcha.com with ProxyOn tasks. For this to work correctly, you'll also need a browser extension like Proxy SwitchyOmega to match your browser's IP address with the proxy's.

proxyOnTasksQuickAddSwitchTitle.message: Switch between quick and normal proxy adding modes

proxyOnTasksQuickAddInputTitle.message: Enter proxy settings (follow the input mask)

playSoundsInfo.message: The plugin plays sounds when a CAPTCHA is found, during the solving process, and to indicate success or error.

delayOnreadyCallbackTitle.message: Delay Geetest onReady callback for websites with short timers

delayOnreadyCallbackInfo.message: Useful for websites with short CAPTCHA timers (e.g., rollercoin.com). Enabling this solves the CAPTCHA before the website is aware it's started, preventing the timer from activating. Currently works only for Geetest.

getAntiCaptchaKey.message: Get an Anti-Captcha.com key.

getFreeAttempts.message: Authorize with your Google account in this browser to get $captchas_count$ free captchas.

newVersionCrxAutoupdate.message: The plugin will update automatically to the latest version.

newVersionZipDownloadLink.message: New version $new_version$ of the AntiCaptcha extension is available for download here.

markInputTitle.message: Mark input as CAPTCHA solution destination (CTRL+SHIFT+3)

unmarkInputTitle.message: Unmark input as CAPTCHA solution destination

agingRecaptchaTitle.message: CAPTCHA solution will expire in %s seconds.

refreshRecaptchaTitle.message: Press here to refresh the CAPTCHA.

imageAutosearchTitle.message: Find and solve CAPTCHA for this input (CTRL+SHIFT+6)

markInputSolverMessage.message: Please mark the CAPTCHA input field
